game.name: Minion Pool Party
game.description:
Three of your favorite minions Bob, Stuart and Kevin have decided to hold a pool party. They all look fabulous and are waiting for your help to organize the party and dress them up. Do you like to guide these three little Minions? Join Minion Pool Party game and be prepared to help them to enjoy at their pool! It will be amazing to have some fun together in this brand new dressing game for girls. All you need to do is follow the instructions and complete the goal successfully. 

Give three of them a nice makeover and help them to pick up the cool and fancy swimsuits in this one of the best girls games! Now it will be in your hands how wisely you make all the arrangements to help your three minion friends to enjoy their sweet vacation in their spa resort. Give them a nice hair treatment and select the swimsuit and other accessories for the minions! Complete all the decoration around the pool and get yourself ready to share the delicious food with them! They will also love to listen to the nice music and have fun together. 

Keep playing like a champion and complete all stages of this new dressing game! We have many other popular pool party titles where you can enjoy with your little yellow friends to the fullest. Play new minion dress-up games on atmegame.com and explore the best fun and excitement on the web together! Put your fashion abilities to challenge to make your favorite characters look stylish! Good luck to have a blast, friends!!
